item: STRING: the item id to be enchanted

enchantments.name: STRING: an enchantment name
enchantments.weight: INTEGER: the chance this enchantment gets selected
enchantments.treasure: BOOLEAN: if this enchantment is a treasure enchantment, default = false
not_with: STRING: what enchantments this cannot combine with
enchantments.max_lvl: INTEGER: max level you can get, default = 1
enchantments.secondairy: BOOLEAN: if this enchantment can get on this item via anvil, but not via enchantment table, default = false

enchantability: INTEGER: how well the item enchants
